deps=func_dependencies('projects_evalweightandcurvevector');
for(di in 1:length(deps)){
	dep=deps[[di]];
	lines=body(dep);
	if(any(grepl('\\bsource\\(',lines) & !grepl('if\\s*\\(!exists',lines))){
		msgf('Function %s has a source() call.',dep); next
	}
}
